image.title: Bass Nation TV Episode #3 w/ Sharay Reed

channel.itunes:keywords: bass guitar, inverview, gospel musicians, gospel music, daric bennett, sharay reed, bass nation, bass nation tv, daricbennett.com
channel.title: Bass Nation TV Episode #3 w/ Sharay Reed
channel.itunes:author: DaricBennett.com
channel.description: In this 3rd Episode of Bass Nation TV I interview Sharay Reed! An extremely well known gospel bass player from Chicago. He is a proficient player on the upright, electric, and synth basses, reads music, and is a music director, arranger, and producer. He has played for Patti LaBelle, Kirk Franklin, R. Kelly, CeCe Winans, Boys II Men, Ramsey Lewis, Aretha Franklin, and Chaka Khan, to name a few. If you don't know Sharay, get to know him in this interview and make sure to search him on YouTube and Google to check out some of his work!

channel.itunes:subtitle: Daric Bennett interviews acclaimed gospel bass player Sharay Reed.
